thread.title: Status:Go To Sponsor Customer Success Showcase At Dreamforce '15
thread.title_full: Status:Go To Sponsor Customer Success Showcase At Dreamforce '15

title: Status:Go To Sponsor Customer Success Showcase At Dreamforce '15
text: Ã— Status GO! SAN FRANCISCO , Sept. 14, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Status:Go, a Salesforce implementation partner focused solely on assisting healthcare providers, will be one of several sponsors of the Customer Success Showcase at Dreamforce '15 taking place in San Francisco September 15-18 . "We are thrilled to be a sponsor at Dreamforce at such an exciting time for Salesforce, especially given the recent announcement of Health Cloud, and a pivotal time in healthcare delivery," said Founder and CEO Scott Blau . "Our goal for this week is to work with healthcare providers and administrators to discuss innovative ways to overcome their unique challenges by using Salesforce." Representatives from Status:Go will be on location at Booth 52 in Moscone Center West to discuss how Salesforce can help healthcare providers achieve their transformation goals and demonstrate the company's: TriageNow, a nurse triage software application built completely for the Salesforce platform. The multi-channel triage app is highly customizable and supports telephone-based and chat-based triage. Healthcare Decision Support, a new decision support framework allowing providers to centralize, automate, and standardize proprietary clinical and administrative content. Healthcare Call Center, a set of solutions supporting both clinical and non-clinical patient acquisition, connection, and retention activities. To celebrate Dreamforce and the success of Status:Go and their customers using Salesforce in Healthcare, Status:Go has made available for download "Start Now. A Salesforce guide for healthcare providers. Tips and Wisdom from the early successes of a top Salesforce healthcare provider implementation partner." For more information about how Status:Go can help your organization or to download your copy of "Tips and Wisdom," visit http://statusgo.force.com . About Status:Go Status:Go is a healthcare technology consulting company and Salesforce implementation partner focused on working with customers in the healthcare industry to develop solutions that support their improvement goals and initiatives. In addition to customized solutions, Status:Go has developed a library of apps and functionality that promises to get organizations up and running quickly, as well as comprehensive training programs to support user adoption. For more information contact healthcare@statusgonow.com or visit http://www.statusgonow.com .
